title: The Traitor Queen
description: Her husband is imprisoned. What will she risk to save him? . . . Lara has watched Ithicana be conquered by her own father. But when she learns her husband, Aren, has been captured in battle, Lara knows her father is only keeping him alive to lure in his traitorous daughter. Risking her life, Lara returns to free the Bridge Kingdom and its king. But her greatest adversary of all might be the very man she's trying to free. Now Lara must decide who she is fighting for: her kingdom, her husband, or herself . . .
author: Danielle L. Jensen
